  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(Game game, Viewable view)
      Returns a new Game controller object with the specified Game model and View.
      Parameters:
      game - The Game to control.
      view - How the game is displayed to the end user.

  • Method Details

    • startTesting

      public void startTesting()
      Starts a testing session by entering the commandReader loop. The loop is exited by entering quit command that uses system.exit

    • startInteractiveGame

      public void startInteractiveGame()
      Starts a 1v1 interactive game vs the AI. Players are restricted to turn play until a win or draw occurs. Or a quit command has been entered.

    • switchView

      public void switchView(Viewable view)

    • handleConsoleInput

      public void handleConsoleInput(String input)
      Performs a command if it is valid, Prints an error message otherwise.
      Parameters:
      input - Console command to be handled

    • handleAddBeadCommand

      private void handleAddBeadCommand(String input, BeadColour beadColour)
      Helper method to add a bead through the testing command.
      Parameters:
      input - String of input to parse for location
      beadColour - Colour of bead to place.
